name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
storytitle: "Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage
storytext: And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Cryo Cicin Mage

skills.name: Misty Summons
skills.description: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, summons Cryo Cicins.

skills.name: Blizzard, Branch, Blossom
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 5 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, grants this character <color=#99FFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}Cryo Application</color>, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Flowing Cicin Shield</color>.
skills.description: Deals 5 Cryo DMG, grants this character Cryo Application, creates 1 Flowing Cicin Shield.
